A4.text: Warner became the senior senator on January 3, 2013, when Jim Webb left the Senate and was replaced by Tim Kaine

A5.text: Senator Mark Warner official U.S. Senate website

A6.text: George Allen was defeated by Jim Webb in the 2006 Senate election, and thus was not a senator in 2013

A7.text: Jim Webb was elected as a U.S. Senator in 2006 and was serving in 2013
